title: Ava's Demon: Book One
description: Ava's Demon is a science fiction webcomic about a girl named Ava and the demon haunting her.Book One, also referred to as Volume One, is the first volume of Ava's Demon and contains the first 500 panels of the webcomic, from Chapter One to Chapter Six. Throughout the book, there are several animations such as "End of Chapter One", "Wrathia's Pact", and "The Plan."
author: Michelle Fus
